last_episode_to_air.name: The Escape
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the help of friends and family, Billy goes on the run, changing his identity and mixing with some of Hollywood's biggest names.

name: Monsters Inside: The 24 Faces of Billy Milligan
original_name: Monsters Inside: The 24 Faces of Billy Milligan
overview: In the late 1970s, an accused serial rapist claims multiple personalities control his behavior, setting off a legal odyssey that captivates America.
tagline: Can one man be guilty and innocent?

episodes.name: The Campus Rapist
episodes.overview: In 1977, after Billy Milligan is accused of multiple rapes near Ohio State University, experts question if he has multiple personality disorder.

episodes.name: The Monsters Inside Me
episodes.overview: Billy's troubled youth comes into focus via interviews with his siblings and childhood friends. At trial, his lawyers mount an unusual defense.

episodes.name: The Golden Age
episodes.overview: As Billy's celebrity rises, a new doctor disagrees with his diagnosis and alters his treatment. Later, Billy takes his care into his own hands.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.overview: With the help of friends and family, Billy goes on the run, changing his identity and mixing with some of Hollywood's biggest names.
